Content: 18*p46936a01828* do not write in this area do not write in this area do not write in this area  *(ii) an increase in the width of mitochondria increases the surface area of membranes inside mitochondria.   explain how an increase in the surface area of these membranes will affect the synthesis of atp in the muscle tissue of an athlete.(6)(total for question 5 = 10 marks)
